data.title: Discover which are the best schools in Murcia
data.meta_description: Do you want to move to Murcia and are looking for a good school for your children? In AQ Acentor we bring you a guide with the best schools in Murcia.
data.text:
Before moving to Murcia, if you are accompanied by young children, you should check out the most outstanding schools in the region. To make it easier for you, we have compiled a list of the best public, charter, private and British schools in Murcia.

Which are the best public schools in Murcia?

Public schools are those that are fully supported by the State, which is in charge of creating and administering them. They are distributed in different residential areas according to the need of each area and offer all the courses of compulsory basic education. Below, to help you choose the best school for your children, we will show you the best public schools available to you.

CEIP José María de Lapuerta School

This is the best public school in Murcia with a public system. It is located in Covadonga Street, 11, in Cartagena and is secular and mixed, offering infant and primary education.

With an approach based on active and innovative methodologies, it offers classes in Spanish and English as vehicular languages. The price range is free or with a maximum cost of 100 €. It offers services such as extended hours, dining room, psycho-pedagogical attention, speech therapist, AMPA and extracurricular activities.

La Flota School

This school is located at Avenida de la Marina Española 6, in the city of Murcia, and has a public, secular and coeducational educational system. It offers infant and primary education with a generic educational model and uses Spanish as a vehicular language. In this school you can have a maximum of 100 €.

La Arboleja School

The school La Arboleja is located in carril de los Chornos & Carril de los Pepines, in Murcia city. It is a public, secular, co-educational school offering kindergarten and primary education. Like other schools mentioned above, it follows a generic educational model with Spanish as the vehicular language. It is free, although it may have some expenses that do not exceed 100 €.

Which are the best charter schools in the Region of Murcia?

A charter school is one that is supported by state aid and financial contributions from the families of the children who attend the school. Here are the best schools in Murcia that have a subsidized education.

San Jorge School Murcia

The San Jorge Murcia school is located in Molina de Segura, on Avenida Picos de Europa, with an education ranging from kindergarten to high school. It stands out for its secular and coeducational approach, with very affordable prices. It offers an educational model based on active and innovative methodologies, with Spanish as the vehicular language. It has services such as school transportation, extended hours, dining room, psycho-pedagogical attention, infirmary, AMPA and extracurricular activities.

Miralmonte School

Located in Cartagena, on Avenida de Génova, the Miralmonte School offers education from kindergarten to high school and vocational training. It has a secular and coeducational educational model, presenting very affordable prices.

On the other hand, Adopta a generic educational model, using Spanish as the vehicular language. It also offers services such as school transportation, extended morning hours, dining room, psycho-pedagogical attention, speech therapist, AMPA and extracurricular activities.

Vistarreal School

The Vistarreal school is located in Molina de Segura, on Sierra Espuña street, and provides education from kindergarten to high school, with a secular and coeducational approach. It offers affordable prices and follows an educational model based on active and innovative methodologies, using Spanish as a vehicular language. It has services such as school transportation, canteen, speech therapist, psycho-pedagogical attention, AMPA and extracurricular activities.

Which are the best private schools in the Region of Murcia?

In a private school, funding comes exclusively from the contributions of the students’ parents. They have total autonomy to decide who is admitted, the entrance requirements and their operation, always within the legal framework. Some schools may have a religious orientation and offer boarding services, where students live together in individual or shared rooms and return home on weekends or special occasions. Below, we show you the ranking of the best schools in the Region of Murcia with a private system.

Montessori British School Murcia

It is located in the Ermita Vieja lane, in Murcia. It is a private center that covers from kindergarten to high school and vocational training. With a secular and mixed approach, it is situated in a price range of between 300 € and 700 €.

This school has an educational model based on personalization and offers a bilingual environment with Spanish and English as vehicular languages. Its services include school transportation, canteen, extended hours, psycho-pedagogical attention, infirmary and extracurricular activities.

Lycée français international of Murcia André Malraux School

It is located at 107 Golf Avenue, in Molina de Segura. This school offers education from kindergarten to high school. With a secular and coeducational character, its price range is between 300 € and 700 €.

This educational center follows a teaching model based on active and innovative methodologies, with French as a vehicular language. Services include school transportation, canteen, psycho-pedagogical attention, extended hours, AMPA and extracurricular activities.

New Castelar College

It is located in Las Palmas street, in San Pedro del Pinatar. This private school covers from kindergarten to high school and vocational training. It is secular and coeducational, with prices ranging from 300 € to 700 €. The school follows an educational model based on performance and excellence, with a bilingual approach in Spanish and English. The services offered include school transportation and canteen.

As you can see, this list of private schools also includes some of the best bilingual schools in Murcia.

Which are the best British schools in Murcia?

British schools in Spain follow the British curriculum along with the teaching of Spanish language and culture. In addition, classes are taught entirely in English. Here are the two best British schools in Murcia.

Limonar International School

The Limonar International School offers bilingual education to students between the ages of 3 and 18. Their education is fragmented between the Buenavista Campus, where they will be taught in kindergarten and primary school, and the Montevida Campus, where they will complete their studies after secondary school and high school.

This school presumes to generate among its students a “strong sense of global awareness and appreciation for other cultures” that will allow them to open their minds and develop social skills, which will positively mark their personality.

King’s College Murcia

King’s College Murcia is located in La Torre Golf Resort and is private. It has an educational model focused on performance and excellence. In addition, it offers school transport services, dining room and extracurricular activities, being an international center.
